titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry at the Ryman Auditorium

mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, yellow and black on white) announcing the Grand Ole Opry at the Ryman Auditorium, the first Opry broadcast from the Ryman since 1974) on January 15 and 16. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Ryman Auditorium and a woodcut of a microphone. The Grand Ole Opry WSM radio program broadcasted from the Ryman Auditorium from 1925 - 1975. The show continues to broadcast on 650 AM WSM at its current location at the Grand Ole Opry House in Opryland.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
